title: Diamond-Studded Gold Kangan - Sparkling Elegance
materials: Round Cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds (American Diamonds)
features: This stunning bangle showcases a contemporary design with a row of brilliantly cut round Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. The diamonds are carefully set in a prong setting, ensuring maximum sparkle and brilliance. The gold has a rich, lustrous Hyderabadi polish which adds to its overall appeal. Simple and yet elegant, perfect for daily wear.
description: This exquisite bangle combines the timeless appeal of gold with the modern sparkle of diamonds. The meticulously hand-crafted design ensures durability and lasting shine. The Hyderabadi polish gives the bangle a luxurious sheen, and the Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds offer the brilliance of natural diamonds at an accessible price point. A perfect blend of style and value.
